## VISIT

#### > [RENT THE PENCE](https://pencegallery.org/visit/rent-the-pence/)

## Welcome

The Pence Gallery is a non-profit art gallery that offers free admission and welcomes visitors of all ages, abilities, and backgrounds. 

**Location & Hours**: We are located at 212 D Street in Davis and are open Tuesday to Sunday, 11:30 AM – 5 PM, for gallery visitors, and 6 – 9 PM on 2nd Fridays for our monthly art receptions. During our annual Holiday Market, we will also be open on Mondays.

**Parking** : There is free street parking by the Gallery, or a paid lot that is one block away. There are also two parking garages, located on 4th & G Street, and 1st & F Street.

**Accessibility** : The Pence is accessible by wheelchair, has an elevator that services the two levels of the gallery, and public restrooms located on the first floor of the gallery. The Pence, however, does not have a public drinking fountain available. Please note that we do not allow animals inside the gallery, including emotional support animals. However, the Pence welcomes certified working service animals that are necessary to assist patrons with disabilities. Service animals must be under control by their handler at all times.

Alejandro Rubio’s solo exhibit, 2009
